short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to make spellcheck work on whole page body.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: To use this, you need to have a dictionary (not language) installed. Technically the Add-on does add the "spellcheck" and "contenteditable" HTML-Attribute to the body tag. The Add-on can toggle these attributes for each browser tab.
